venue.address_1: please contact revchristine@centersoflight.org to get the full address
venue.name: North Cambridge - Close to Alewife

item.description:
Mystics of all paths have studied and meditated on the life of the Great Avatars and Saints to understand the meanings of life and the steps for their spiritual development.

Join us in this seminar for an in-depth look at the inner meaning of Christmas. The Christmas story is a gift for us to understand how Jesus, Mary, Joseph and other characters represent specific aspects of us, and what parts they play in our spiritual development.

All faiths are welcome
There is no charge for this event.
Donations small or large greatly appreciated

May you experience this holy season with peace and joy
item.name: The Mystical Meaning of the Christmas Story
